section.title: Maintain External Shipping Records
section.para: To maintain external shipping records, select the "Maintain External Shipping Records" option. The following screen will appear:
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating external shipping data, returning you to the previous screen.
Opens screen for entering new shipping data.
Enables you to open External Shipping Maintenance screen and edit shipping data.
Highlight a shipping record and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight an shipping record and then select this button to remove the record from the list.
